title: "The Awakening of the Self: A Complementary Path to Meditation"
first_phrase: In the final section, the article highlights how awakening to one's being is not just limited to meditation but can also be a direct and complementary path to ascend to higher levels of consciousness. It can aid in therapy for emotional problems and lead to a transformation that makes living more conscious and simple. The recovery of all energies, including sexual energy, can facilitate the process. The text also offers additional information on Quantum NeuroTraining, a software to develop inner powers, and a list of recommended books on hypnosis and PNL, including books on improving one's sex life through self-hypnosis and practical sex magic.
content: “Quantum NeuroTraining” consiste en una serie de instrumentos diseñados expresamente para despertar los poderes interiores del ser humano. Le proporcionamos a continuación una lista de libros que le ayudarán con certeza a ampliar sus horizontes. Entre ellos: Bibliografía y lecturas recomendadas En la página: http://www.pnl-nlp.org/dn/ podrá encontrar enlaces sobre hipnosis y PNL. Se trata de libros gratuitos y útiles. Entre las diferentes obras de interés que consultamos para la redacción de esta obra, mencionamos a continuación algunas de ellas. Hipnosis y sexualidad "Look Into My Eyes — How To Use Hypnosis To Bring Out The Best In Your Sex Life" de Peter Masters. Publicado por Greenery Press en 2001 160 Pp, ISBN : 1-890159-28-X "Improve Your Sex Life Through Self-Hypnosis" de John G. Kappas. Publicado por Prentice Hall en septiembre de 1984 143 Pp, ISBN: 0134533666 Hypnotize Your Lover - "HYPNOTIZE YOUR LOVER" Wendi Friesen, 260 Páginas © 1999 Wendi Friesen "Ecstatic Ritual: Practical Sex Magic" by Brandy Williams. Publicado por Prism Ltd, Noviembre 1990 ASIN: 1853270512 "Modem Sex Magick — Secrets Of Erotic Spirituality" de Donald Michael Kraig, Linda Falorio, Nema, Tara.
last_phrase: In conclusion, "Quantum NeuroTraining" offers a set of tools to awaken our inner powers. We have provided a list of free and useful books on hypnosis and NLP on our website. These books include topics on enhancing sexual experiences, such as "Look Into My Eyes," "Seductive Communication," and "The Lifestyle." By studying these books, readers can expand their knowledge and explore new horizons.
